extension.name: Emundus Registration Redirect Plugin
extension.author: eMundus
extension.description: This plugin enables you to handle redirect to a custom registration page

param.name: url_to_registration
param.label: URL
param.description: The URL for the registration page.

param.name: item_id
param.label: Item ID for registation page
param.description: Add an item ID here if you would like to assign specific modules to the registration page.

field.name: url_to_registration
field.label: URL
field.description: The URL for the registration page, you can put a JText tag here for SEF URls that are translated.

field.name: item_id
field.label: Item ID for registation page
field.description: Add an item ID here if you would like to assign specific modules to the registration page.
